{{doc.get_formatted("offer_date")}}

Dear {{doc.custom_salutation}}. {{doc.applicant_name}},

CONDITIONAL OFFER OF EMPLOYMENT

We are Elite Resources Center, it is our pleasure to extend an Offer of Employment to you on behalf of Cummins Saudi Arabia LLC, the specifics of which are highlighted below:

Designation:  {{doc.designation}}

Location:  {{doc.custom_location}}

Salary Grade:  {{doc.custom_salary_grade}}

Reporting to:  {{doc.custom_reporting_to}}

Your Compensation would be as follows:

{% for row in doc.custom_salary_details%} {% endfor %}
Monthly Salary
Salary Components Paid Monthly (SAR) Equivalent Annual (SAR)
{{row.salary_components}} {{row.get_formatted("amount")}} {% set total_annualy_comp = row.amount * 12 %}{{ frappe.format(total_annualy_comp, {'fieldtype': 'Currency'}) }}
Total Salary {{doc.get_formatted("custom_total_salary")}} {% set total_annualy_salary = doc.custom_total_salary * 12 %}{{ frappe.format(total_annualy_salary, {'fieldtype': 'Currency'}) }}

Additionally:

  • Medical Insurance for yourself
  • 22 working days of leave
  • End of service and Gratuity: as per KSA Labor Law
  • End of service and Gratuity will not be paid in case you are: Terminated for cause.In the event of your being part of any International or Other Superannuation / Pension Scheme that Cummins operates in any other part of the world, through a Secondment / International Assignment.
  • In addition to your base salary, you will be eligible for a variable compensation package of 8 % annually subject to certain performance criteria being achieved.
  • The criteria for the plan are subject to change each year in line with corporate directives. Bonus payments are made to employees who are active (Employed) on the payment date of Variable Compensation. They are paid on a pro-rata basis dependent on the month in which you started.
  • Variable Compensation however shall not be paid to employees who leave voluntarily prior the payment date or terminated for cause.
  • This job offer is subjective to the employee’s upon accepting the job offer to extend a written prove of the resignation/ end of employment from his current organization.

This job offer is subjected to a probation period of 90 days that may extend to 180 days as per MOL article 53 and 54.

This offer is valid for three days from the date of issue.

If you accept our offer, you are kindly requested to sign it and scan it back to us.

  • ID
  • Passport
  • Your Degree
  • Your courses and experience (if applicable)
  • Copy of IBAN BANK
  • Filling the Employee Details Form (attached)
  • Copy of Driver's License if applicable
  • Personal Photo
  • National Address in case you are based in Saudi.
Regards,
Accepted,
{% if frappe.session.user == "b.alayyaf@eliteresources.co" or frappe.session.user == "n.alayyaf@eliteresources.co" or frappe.session.user == "Administrator" %} {% endif %}
Mr. Mohammed Alsharhan
Founder – MD
Signature: _________
Expecting Joining Date:    /    /{% set date_string = frappe.utils.today() %}{% set current_year = date_string.split("-")[0] %}{{ current_year }}

If any statement made by you either verbally or on your CV is found to be false or misleading or if you did not disclose information that retrospectively is found to be prejudicial to the Company, then termination proceedings may commence.

Dear {{doc.custom_salutation}}. {{doc.applicant_name}},

CONDITIONAL OFFER OF EMPLOYMENT

We are delighted to offer you the position of {{doc.designation}}, at Elite Resources Center ("the Company") in Riyadh Head Office, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, on the principal terms and conditions set out below. Your fixed monthly compensation is as described in the table below:

{% for row in doc.custom_salary_details%} {% endfor %}
Description Monthly Salary (SAR)
{{row.salary_components}} {{row.get_formatted("amount")}}
Total Monthly({{frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.custom_total_salary)}}) {{doc.get_formatted("custom_total_salary")}}
Total Annual({{frappe.utils.money_in_words((doc.custom_total_salary * 12))}}) {% set total_annualy = doc.custom_total_salary * 12 %}{{ frappe.format(total_annualy, {'fieldtype': 'Currency'}) }}

In addition to the above stated, you will be provided with the following benefits:

  • You will be eligible for a Medical Insurance + {% if doc.custom_life_insurance_applicable == "Yes" %} Life Insurance + {% endif %} discretionary Annual Bonus based on the basic salary (depending on employee and company performance).
  • NEOM Additional Benefits: Applicable from the time you are deputed to NEOM site.
  • Special Allowance: An additional allowance of 35% (15% Site allowance + 20% extended hours premium) of basic salary will be paid to you during your assignment in NEOM Project. This will be only applicable during your stay in NEOM Project campsite.
  • Home Leave: You will be eligible for a 2 nights Mid-Rotation Break (capped at 5250 SAR) and Two weeks paid home leave with completion of every Eight weeks work at campsite as per rotation schedule.
  • Rotation Schedule: NEOM working week is 10 Hours per day and 6 days per week. You will be working on an 8-week onsite, 2 weeks Holiday rotation basis (plus one additional travel day) while you are on assignment on NEOM project. You will not be entitled to your annual leaves benefit when you opt for the site rotation.
  • Accommodation: You will be provided with accommodation, food, Laundry and Leisure facility (camp-based).
  • Transportation: You will be provided with an appropriate transportation means to site.
  • Flight Tickets: Economy Flight tickets back home will be provided to you on an 8:2 rotation basis (8 weeks on-site, 2 weeks off-site).
Regards,
Accepted,
